projects.titel: Bootstrap Portfolio: My initial portfolio crafted using Bootstrap.
Capstone Project: I built an e-Commerce website selling football jerseys.
Javascript Project: I built a point of sales system (POS) website.
BMI Calculator: A functional BMI calculator I buit with JavaScript.
e-Commerce Website: I built an e-commerce site with MySQL and APIs.
Calculator: A fully functional calculator I built with JavaScript.

Testimonials.Name: Imraan
Testimonials.message: I wholeheartedly endorse Uthmaan, an ambitious and driven individual aspirng to excel in the field of Frontend Web-Development. Uthmaan possesses an unwavering passion for creating visually captivating and highly functional websites, demonstrating a firm commitment for professional growth.

Testimonials.Name: Ma'arij
Testimonials.message: Uthmaan is a quiet person, but once you get to know him, you will discover that he is a very energetic individual who is always eager to learn new things. He is always focused and determined that he will accomplish big things in his future. When working with him, he is always giving a 110%.

Testimonials.Name: Codi
Testimonials.message: Uthmaan is a very determined, passionate, and kind young man. Uthi strives his best to make sure his deadlines and work are done as soon as possible and correctly as possible. Once you get to know him, you feel a sense of belonging as he is able to welcome you in with warm energy.

Testimonials.Name: Justin
Testimonials.message: Over the course of these past six months, I have had the distinct pleasure of gaining profound insights into the character and capabilities of Uthmaan. His unyielding commitment to personal and professional growth has been a defining trait throughout our acquaintance

Testimonials.Name: Keeno
Testimonials.message: Uthmaan Samsodien is the most friendly person I know. He is committed to what he does and his determination is unmatched when it comes to solving a problem. He is hard-working and does his best in everything. He is the person to have on your team and there is a sense of pride in everything he does.

Testimonials.Name: Mish-Al
Testimonials.message: When it comes to personal qualities, Uthmaan stands out as one of the most friendly and kind-hearted individuals I have ever known. His genuine warmth and compassion permeate every interaction, creating an inviting and supportive atmosphere around him, making it easy to get along with him.
